book.runology.guidebook.name: Runic Codex
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.discover: You feel a mysterious force coming out of that object, maybe you should infuse a book with that force?
These holes in space appear to lead to somewhere else, while I may not be able to cross them, I may be able to extract energy from them.
emi.info.runology.guidebook: Obtain a Runic Codex by dropping a book nearby a Shatter
